item.description: Come join me for tapas at one of the best restaurants in the Brighton and Brookline area. If coming by public transportation take the B line and get off at the Washington Square T stop. I'll get there by 6pm and hangout in the bar.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll get there around 6:15pm and hangout in the bar area...

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Tapas at Tasca Restaurant in Brighton
